notifications.longBreakStart: Great job! Time for a long break.

settings.helpDescription: Need help? Check out our user guide to discover all features.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: The Pomodoro Timer is a time management technique that helps you stay focused and productive. The method involves working for 25 minutes followed by a short break.

timer.title: Timer
timer.description: The timer is at the heart of the Pomodoro technique. By default, it's set to 25 minutes of work followed by a 5-minute short break. After 4 cycles, you get a longer 15-minute break.
timer.controls: Use the control buttons to start, pause, or reset the timer. You can also use keyboard shortcuts.

cycles.title: Work Cycles
cycles.description: A complete cycle consists of a work period followed by a break. After 4 work cycles, you earn a longer break to rest and recharge.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Customize your experience by adjusting period durations, changing the theme, language, and enabling notifications to never miss a cycle change.
